header_text: You have been feeling a little sick lately, so you schedule a doctor's appointment. The soonest appointment you can get is a few days away. While you wait for your doctor's appointment, you think your sickness is probably serious.

elements.Text: Do you think you are going to feel better soon?

elements.name: You have been feeling a little sick lately, so you schedule a doctor's appointment. The soonest appointment you can get is a few days away. While you wait for your doctor's appointment, you think your sickness is probably serious._Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
